actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend Schedule 3 of the Tariff Schedules of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the classification of certain woven fabrics of man-made fibers and to require the rate of duty for such articles to be subject to the same staged rate reductions that were proclaimed by the President for a specified article of the Schedules.

titles.title: A bill to amend Schedule 3 of the Tariff Schedules of the United States.
